LanguageData.Ammo_4570Gov_FMJ.label: .45-70 Government Cartridge (FMJ)
LanguageData.Ammo_4570Gov_FMJ.description: Rather large and bulky rifle cartridge propelled by a 'black powder'. Good for making people imitate sacks when they are hit.

LanguageData.Ammo_4570Gov_AP.description: Rather large and bulky rifle cartridge propelled by a 'black powder'. Good for making people imitate sacks when they are hit.
